objects.text:
• Adjustable Height & Tilt
• Premium PU Leather
• Ergonomic Padded Design
• Supports up to 275 lbs

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
The banner features a product-centric layout showcasing an ergonomic office chair. The primary focal point is the product image (`product_image`) placed to the right side, occupying significant space for visual emphasis. On the left, a bold title (`heading`) and subtitle (`subheading`) introduce the product. Below that, a list of key features (`description`) is presented in bullet format for easy scanning. The price (`price`) is highlighted prominently to enhance visibility. At the bottom, a solid call-to-action button (`cta_button`) contains the text (`cta`) centered in bold white. The background integrates soft geometric divisions and abstract lines for a contemporary, clean look.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Beige: `#F5F5F5`
- Cream: `#F0ECE8`
- Warm Grey: `#DAD7D3`
- Taupe Grey: `#C8C2B7`
- Pale Ivory: `#E8E4DD`
- Charcoal Grey: `#3A3A3A`
- Mid Grey: `#615F5C`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases an office chair with a sophisticated, minimalist color palette ideal for a professional ad banner. The main color is an elegant off-white/cream tone (#F0ECE6) used for the upholstery, providing a clean, modern aesthetic. This is contrasted by bold matte black elements (#1A1A1A) including the base, wheels, and armrest frame, which add strength and depth. A subtle gray (#B0B0B0) outlines stitching, blending smoothly into the cream surface while highlighting contours and texture. These shades merge seamlessly while maintaining distinct visibility. For an ad banner, use soft beige (#E6DED4), crisp white (#FFFFFF), and charcoal gray (#2E2E2E) to balance elegance and readability.
